task: Develop a basic 'Command & Conquer' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Abandon normal instruments'.
name: Anomaly Tactics

branding_data.short_description: Anomaly Tactics is a strategic twist on classic real-time strategy games, where unconventional tactics are key.
branding_data.detailed_description: Anomaly Tactics reimagines the traditional real-time strategy gameplay by encouraging players to abandon conventional methods of warfare. In this game, players must command their forces using unconventional tools and strategies to outmaneuver opponents. The game offers a diverse set of factions, each with unique, non-traditional units and abilities that defy typical RTS norms. With a focus on creativity and lateral thinking, players must adapt and innovate on the fly to achieve victory. The dynamic environments and unpredictable elements force players to think outside the box, making every match a unique challenge.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
